Text:
Am I the only one here who was laughing super hard while reading the DESCRIPTION?? ^_^

Sims 3 Late Night = In the Twilight (Super GAAAY =P )
Sims 3 Generations = All ages?? LOL!
Sims 3 Showtime = Show Business...why not Showbizz? ;)

Sorry! I just can't help but to laugh! HAHA
ok! by the way, I'm sorry if you are offended but your account is extremely suspicious.

Thanks for this. It is the first version I've come across that is so easy to set up with NO errors! I simply press setup, it sets up. I then go to play it and it PLAYS! I am in shock, almost. Thank you x a million.
Ok, I have downloaded and successfully set up the game. However, I can't find an icon to start the game. How can I actually start playing?
It automatically put a shortcut on my desktop when I installed it, but it's also under "All Programs > R.G. Catalyst > The Sims 3 Deluxe Edition"
Hopefully somebody can answer this: If I use this installer will I be able to install future expansions?
does it also work on mac?
How do you install Seasons over this? I don't know how to do it since it asks me over and over to install the base game.
